Entries.default: "Gives me gooseflesh just looking at this place."
"A Wahaki tribesman once bedded me in a similar ruin. Not the most hygienic evening."
"Suppose we be going in there next? With the traps and the spiders and the gods knows what else?"
"I can see why few have ventured here. The stench alone could turn an aptapo's stomach."
"Reeks like... spoiled vegetables and bilge water. How's about next time I choose our vacation spot?"
"This place makes me think of an old neighbor of mine, couldn't stand yard work."
"This reminds me of parts of the Cythwood I'd just as soon forget."
